document.discussion_title: Hema Malini backs Salman as ambassador
document.topic_text: You are here: Home » India Hema Malini backs Salman as ambassador Please enable the javascript of your browser to see the video. URL: Comment Salman Khan's appointment as the goodwill ambassador for Rio Olympic 2016 has sparked a big controversy, with several sportsmen raising objections and asking why was a Bollywood actor was chosen over sporting legends. Now, BJP MP Hema Malini has backed Salman Khan.
